body: The TV wildlife presenter is approaching his 90th birthday on 8 May and to celebrate we’d love to hear your tips on how to live well as you get older. Whether you’re retired or still working we’d like to hear what you think makes a good life in your later years. What makes you happy? Do you live a fulfilled life? Perhaps you have a relative you would like to nominate as someone who knows how to live well. How and why do they inspire you? You can share your photos and experiences by clicking on the ‘Contribute’ button on this article. You can also use the Guardian app and search for ‘GuardianWitness assignments.’ Alternatively you can fill in our form below. We’ll use a selection of your contributions in our ongoing reporting.  GuardianWitness is the home of readers’ content on the Guardian. Contribute your video, pictures and stories, and browse news, reviews and creations submitted by others. Posts will be reviewed prior to publication.
webTitle: Living well in older age: share your experiences
